Subskills.name: Crusade Allies
Subskills.description: Allies healed by holy nova take reduced damage for a short period.

Subskills.name: Practical Punishment
Subskills.description: Chance to stun monsters on hit.

Subskills.name: Righteous Transaction
Subskills.description: Steal a portion of target life on hit over time.

Subskills.name: Strength Prayer
Subskills.description: Increases area of effect radius of holy nova.

Subskills.name: Strong Faith
Subskills.description: Increases the damage dealt by holy nova.

Subskills.description: Holy nova no longer heals you or your allies but recovers a portion of your maximum mana instead.

Subskills.description: Holy nova heals you for a portion of your missing life.

Subskills.description: Chance on cast to increase your and allied arcane damage and magic find for a short period.

Subskills.name: Faith's Winds
Subskills.description: Unleash multiple smaller orbiting novas around you.

Subskills.name: Warrior's Light
Subskills.description: Increases damage dealt by holy nova scaling with your vitality.

Subskills.description: Increases damage dealt by holy nova and gives a chance to instantly execute non-boss targets affected by mark of judgement.

Subskills.name: Heaven's Chosen
Subskills.description: Chance on cast to unleash an additional holy nova.

Subskills.name: Mark of Judgement
Subskills.description: Mark target monsters with judgement on hit causing them to take increased damage on hit consuming the mark.

Subskills.name: Remote Prayer
Subskills.description: Holy nova now heals all allies within the same area with increased power.
